page.title: 01INTRODUCTION,LOWER PENARTH.
page.content: {Penarth,a Victorian resort}with a busy shopping centre has a{promenade}that extends from a{pier}to the cliff top. From the golf course and playground on the cliff walk to Lavernock we see yachts,anglers,and water skiers.Across the{Bristol Channel}we see the island of{Steepholme}and the{lighthouse}on Flatholme.Lower Penarth,a mile fromthe town centre is our study area.Features are,{Cosmeston country park,}ruins of a{medieval village}Glamorganshire golf club,{Penarth rugby club plus several playing fields.Scattered{mixed farms and pasture border large housing areas {Three shops}serve the area,planning approval granted for new shops near to {Lavernock Park}estate.Two pubs. serve hot and cold meals.Pupils of{Evenlode {Primary}walk to school.Most parents own cars,travelling to{Cardiff}to work so use of public transport is limited.
